title: BRIEF-s&p rates Banco de Chile's $100 million senior unsecured notes 'A+'

content: SANTIAGO  June 30 Banco de Chile  one of Chile's largest banks  agreed last week to buy the credit portfolio of the smaller Banco Penta  a source told Reuters on Tuesday.
name: Banco De Chile
title: Banco de Chile to buy Penta's credit portfolio - source
